lexicalizations.lex: The Aston Martin V8, related to the Aston Martin DBS and the Aston Martin RHAM/1, is a Coupe with an engine volume of 5.3 litres. It is assembled in Newport Pagnell.
The Aston Martin RHAM/1, and the Aston Martin DBS are related means of transport to the Aston Martin V8. The latter vehicle is a coupe with a 5.3 litre engine and is assembled at Newport Pagnell.
ALCO RS-3, is made by the American Locomotive Company, where a total of 1418 were produced. It has 12 cylinders and has a V12 engine, its total length is 17068.8 mm.
The builder of the ALCO RS-3 is the American Locomotive Company and a total of 1418 were made. The ALCO RS-3 is 17068.8 (millimetres) in length, has a cylinder count of 12 and a V12 engine.
A total of 1418 ALCO RS-3s were built at the American Locomotive Company. It has 12 cylinders, a V12 engine and has a length of 17068.8 mms.
